alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 23 at 5:25PM EST until December 24 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Large battering waves will lead to significant splashover. This may cause damage to roadways along the coast and erosion. * WHERE...Coastal Hancock and Coastal Washington counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Numerous coastal roads may be closed or damaged due to overwash. * WAVE IMPACTS...Expect moderate beach erosion at locations such as Rogue Bluffs due to large breaking waves. Rocks associated with splashover may wash across exposed coastal roads, resulting in road closures and damage to passing vehicles.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
